item.title: Saatchi Art Artist: David Sims; Black & White 2004 Photography "Kate, Paris Vogue (Edition 2 of 5) SOLD"
item.description:
Saatchi Art Artist: David Sims; Black & White 2004 Photography "Kate, Paris Vogue (Edition 2 of 5) SOLD"

Edition 2 of 5, 2 Artist Proofs This iconic image of Kate Moss was shot for Vogue Paris by David Sims and published in March of 2004. Archival Coated Pigment Print, printed in 2013 Signed by artist on label to affix to frame.
